page.title: 16WHITEMOOR ACTIVITIES
page.content: The{Women's Institute Organisation}has 15 members and is part of the Brannel Group. Meetings are held every 3rd Wednesday in the month with varying activities and speakers. Fund raising events are organised to keep the building, a small 3 roomed hall, in good repair. A Christmas Party is organised for all the Pensioners of the village. The Institute has added weight to the{public concern}in a village that has no pavements and road signs have been placed by Cornwall County Highways. The{Whitemoor Playgroup}has been in existence since Jan.'85 and the local school is used 2 mornings per week. {Whitemoor Recreation Ground}has slide, swings,swing-boats,a sand pit,2 tennis courts and a small area of grass for football. Nominal fees are paid to 2 pensioners for up-keep.
